body_html:
@yaroslavvb It worked thanks!!!!

There were no errors in graph construction

But during the graph execution in backprop i get this error and its tracebacked to-
tf.gradients(c, ...)
then it points to the
line where i defined the "stuff"[as per your comment]

ERROR:
InvalidArgumentError (see above for traceback): Input to reshape is a tensor with 16777216 values, but the requested shape has 4096 [[Node: gradients/truediv_grad/Reshape = Reshape[T=DT_FLOAT, Tshape=DT_INT32, _device="/job:localhost/replica:0/task:0 /device:GPU:0"](gradients/truediv_grad/Sum, gradients/truediv_grad/Shape)]]

Do i need to make some other changes as well?

body:
@yaroslavvb It worked thanks!!!!

There were no errors in graph construction

But during the graph execution in backprop i get this error and its tracebacked to-
`tf.gradients(c, ...)`
then it points to the
`line where i defined the "stuff"[as per your comment]`

ERROR:
`InvalidArgumentError (see above for traceback): Input to reshape is a tensor with 16777216 values, but the requested shape has
4096
         [[Node: gradients/truediv_grad/Reshape = Reshape[T=DT_FLOAT, Tshape=DT_INT32, _device="/job:localhost/replica:0/task:0
/device:GPU:0"](gradients/truediv_grad/Sum, gradients/truediv_grad/Shape)]]
`

Do i need to make some other changes as well?
